company.name: Bastone
company.coreBusiness: Manufacturing of plasticizers and PVC resin for the plastics industry. Bastone produces essential chemical additives and base materials used in polymer applications, serving as a key supplier of compounds for PVC and flexible plastic manufacturing.
company.valueProposition: As a specialized manufacturer of plasticizers and PVC resin in China, Bastone provides essential raw materials for the plastics industry with a focus on quality chemical compounds for diverse polymer applications.

searchIntent.coreQuestion: How do factories transform raw PVC material into the pipes we see in hardware stores and construction sites?

goldenInsights.insight: PVC doesn't melt like other plastics - it 'fuses' at 65-70% optimal level, explaining why processing is more demanding
Without additives, every single PVC part would come out degraded - stabilizers aren't optional enhancements, they're survival mechanisms
Modern PVC lines produce pipe at 16-28 meters per minute - almost one football field of pipe every 3-4 minutes
goldenInsights.suggestedUse: wow factor for production speed section

goldenInsights.insight: Temperature window is razor-thin: 180-210C or the pipe either won't fuse properly OR will decompose and turn yellow
